page.title: 06The new pipeline
page.content: At{Appley in Ryde}some men are putting some new pipes to take all our sewage{water}and dirty water further out to sea.All our sewage water only used to go out as far as the pier or not even as far as that. {Southern Water}are laying{huge pipes {and the pipes will}take all our{dirty {water two and a half miles out to sea. {The whole}operation will cost Â£6,000,000 and it will be finished in 1987 which is two whole years and I will be 11 years old. The pipes are very big.I once went to see a{Sewage Farm.}Southern Water are doing the project so that our sea will be{cleaner}and {healthier}and that tourists will come over to the Island and think what a nice place it is on{The Isle of Wight. }
